room.name: The Treasury
room.description: You are in a small but well equipped treasury. You can see some writing on the wall. The ceiling has a funny glow, which enables you to see. You can get back into the inner lair through the stone door which is east.

direction.general_description: You look back through the opening into the inner lair.

extra_description.description: This is a heavy black stone door it looks very solid.
You read the number '666'.

room.name: The Inner Lair
room.description: You are in a octagonal room with smooth purple stone walls. The floor is made from black stone. In the western wall you see a large black stone door.

direction.general_description: You look back through the door into the lair.
You see the treasury.

room.name: The Lair
room.description: On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce. To the north is a wooden door.

direction.general_description: You can see the inner lair.
You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.

extra_description.description: On all the skulls you notice that there is a three inch hole in the forehead. All the bones are broken and old.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.

room.name: The Lair
room.description: On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

direction.general_description: You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.

extra_description.description: On all the skulls you notice that there is a three inch hole in the forehead. All the bones are broken and old.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.

room.name: The Lair
room.description: On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

direction.general_description: You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.
You see the lair entrance.

extra_description.description: On all the skulls you notice that there is a three inch hole in the forehead. All the bones are broken and old.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.

room.name: The Lair
room.description: On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

direction.general_description: You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.

extra_description.description: On all the skulls you notice that there is a three inch hole in the forehead. All the bones are broken and old.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.

room.name: The Lair
room.description: On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

direction.general_description: You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.

extra_description.description: All the bones are broken and old.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.

room.name: The Lair
room.description: On the floor you see a lot of human decay, like bones and skulls. You also see a lot of slime. On the wall is a torch sitting in its sconce.

direction.general_description: You see another part of the lair.
You see another part of the lair.

extra_description.description: On all the skulls you notice that there is a three inch hole in the forehead. All the bones are broken and old.
The slime is slimy and uninteresting.
The torch is bolted to the sconce and the sconce to the wall.

room.name: The Lair Entrance
room.description: You are in a dry part of the sewer. To the north is a wooden door, you can see some slime at the lower part of the door. You also see some skulls and some broken bones.

direction.general_description: You can see the lair.
You see a crawlway.

extra_description.description: The slime is slimy and uninteresting.

room.name: The Crawlway
room.description: You are in a narrow crawlway. It is rather boring here.

direction.general_description: You see a four-way junction.
You see the entrance to a lair.

room.name: The Four-Way Junction
room.description: You are in a sewer junction. To the north is a small hole, to the west is a narrow crawlway and to the east and south the sewer continues.

direction.general_description: You can see a small cave-like room.
You can see a sewer drain.
You can see a sewer drain.
You can see a narrow crawlway.

room.name: The Small Cave
room.description: You are in a collapsed sewer drain, which now is more like a small cave.

direction.general_description: You look back into the four-way junction.

room.name: The Sewer Drain
room.description: You are in a dry sewer drain which bends to the north.

direction.general_description: You can see the drain continuing north.
You can see the four-way junction.

room.name: The Sewer Drain
room.description: You are in a dry sewer drain which bends to the east.

direction.general_description: You can see the drain continuing east.
You can see the drain continuing south.

room.name: The End Of The Drain
room.description: You are at the end of the drain around you the sewer has collapsed, the only exit is west.

direction.general_description: You see the sewer drain.

room.name: The Half-Wet Drain
room.description: You are in a sewer drain where the floor is covered with water. To the north it looks more dry, south however the drain runs down into some water.

direction.general_description: To the north lies a dry four-way junction.
To the south you see a sewer drain filled with water.

extra_description.description: The water is dirty but it looks like you would be able to swim in it.

room.name: Under Water In The Sewer
room.description: You are swimming in some dirty water and are holding your breath. You'd better continue onwards before you drown. It is a good thing that you can hold your light above the water-level.

direction.general_description: It is hard to see, but it looks like the drain runs slightly upwards.
It is hard to see, but it looks like the drain runs a little bit upwards.

room.name: The Half-Dry Drain
room.description: You are in a half-dry sewer drain. To the north the drain runs a little bit downwards into some water to the east you can see a small hole. To the west you see another drain.

direction.general_description: You see the drain running down into some water.
Through the hole you can just make out a very small room.
You see a drain running to the west.

extra_description.description: The water is dirty but it looks like you would be able to swim in it.
Through the hole you can just make out a very small room.

room.name: The Very Small Room
room.description: You are in a very small room, it is pretty uninteresting.

direction.general_description: Through the little hole you can see a half-dry drain.

room.name: A Dry Sewer Drain
room.description: You are in a dry but dirty sewer drain. The drain continues east and south.

direction.general_description: You see a half-dry drain.
You see another boring sewer drain.

room.name: A Boring Drain
room.description: You are in yet another sewer drain.

direction.general_description: You see a sewer drain continuing to the north.
You can see another drain to the east.

room.name: The Sewer Drain
room.description: You are in a sewer drain, there is nothing special in here, except for a loud echo.

direction.general_description: You can see another sewer drain.
You can make out a sewer drain to the west.
You can see a sewer line.

room.name: The Sewer Drain
room.description: You are in a drain, with some slimy water on the floor.

direction.general_description: You see a sewer bend.
You see a sewer drain.

extra_description.description: The water floats to the east from here.

room.name: The Sewer Bend
room.description: You find yourself in an ordinary sewer bend, which bends from west to north.

direction.general_description: You see a sewer drain.
You see a sewer drain.

room.name: The Sewer Junction
room.description: You stand in a junction of three sewer drains. You see some odd scratches on the pipe wall, as if from a gigantic rat. North and south the sewer continues as usual, but west it looks a little strange.

direction.general_description: You see nothing but a sewer drain.
You see nothing but a sewer drain.
You see a strange sewer pipe.

room.name: The Sewer
room.description: You are in a sewer, where the slimy water runs down through a tiny hole. You see some odd scratches on the pipe wall, as from a gigantic rat. There is a sewer drain south.

direction.general_description: You see a sewer drain.

room.name: The Strange Sewer
room.description: You are in a very strange sewer indeed, there are some odd scratches on the pipe wall, as from a gigantic rat. And you can see a lot of organic decay like bones from animals AND humans. West the drain runs slightly upwards.

direction.general_description: You see a sewer junction.
You see a slimy sewer drain.

room.name: The Damp Sewer
room.description: You are in a sewer drain with a funny damp substance on the floor, in the substance you see a lot of decay. You see some odd scratches on the wall, as if from a gigantic rat. Both to the east and west the pipe seems to run down.

direction.general_description: You see a sewer.
You see a sewer.

room.name: The Strange Sewer
room.description: You are in an ordinary sewer except for a lot of scratches on the sewer wall, and a lot of debris on the floor.

direction.general_description: You see a sewer.
You see another sewer.

extra_description.description: You see a lot of organic decay on the floor.

room.name: The Sewer
room.description: You are in a sewer with more scratches on the walls. And of course a whole lot of decay. The drain runs east and north.

direction.general_description: You see yet another sewer line.
You see a sewer pipe.

room.name: The Sewer Drain
room.description: You stand in a sewer drain, you are able to see some kind of cave-like room. You see some odd scratches on the drain wall, as if from a gigantic rat. The sewer leads south.

direction.general_description: You see a cave-like room.
You see a sewer.

room.name: The Rat's Lair
room.description: You are in a little cave. You are able to see quite a lot of debris on the floor. There is a sewer drain west of here.

direction.general_description: You see the sewer system that way.

room.name: The Wall Of The Abyss
room.description: You hang onto some steps leading down into utter darkness. There is an exit leading up as well, though you'll have to open the tiny rock again to do so.

room.name: The Entrance
room.description: You are in a very dark room. You notice that some faces are staring at you from inside the walls. In the middle of the room there is a small altar. To the north there is a small round door.

direction.general_description: A beam of red light seeps through a hole in the door.

extra_description.description: This altar is very special. Faces appear to be smiling from it. There is a triangle engraved in the top of it.
The triangle is filled with small symbols. They seem to be a language you have never seen before.

room.name: The Corridor
room.description: The corridor is glowing oppressively in a red hue. You can hear wailing through an open black hole to the east. To the south there is a round door.

direction.general_description: The hole seems more black than the night. It is appears to be "eating" the red light around it.

extra_description.description: The door is completely round without a keyhole.
The red light glows from the walls.
The walls look alive.

room.name: The Realm Of Lost Souls
room.description: You are standing in nothing. All around you there are stars. Sometimes a shadow flies closely by you, wailing very loudly. To the north there is a small bright hole. To the west there is a small red hole.

direction.general_description: You look into a very bright hole.
You look into a red hole.

extra_description.description: The shadow looks like a man in great pain.

room.name: The T-Crossing
room.description: You are in a small hallway. There are doors to the east and to the west. To the south there are a black hole. There is writing in the wall. Wails can be heard from the south.

direction.general_description: It is too dark to tell.
A black hole in the wall.
You can see a big fire to the west. It looks like a unhealthy place to enter!

extra_description.description: The writing says 'The one to the east, belongs to the beast. To the west you will surely END your quest!'.

room.name: The Firedeath
room.description: This room is very hot. There are flames surrounding you. You can see no exits at all! Skeletons are lying all over the floor.

extra_description.description: The skeletons looks like they had suffered the death of hunger. One of them looks like he has written something at the wall.
The writing says 'A prayer to the GODS will not be heard, though the only exit is death... Mother, I love you'.

room.name: The Torture Room
room.description: You are standing in a middle of a square room. Along the walls skeletons are hanging in rusty chains. In the middle of the room there is a big metal box, covered with dust. To the south you can just make out a small exit.

direction.general_description: It is too dark to tell.

extra_description.description: When you look at the skeletons, you can see that they once had been in great pain. They are hanging in their arms, and some of them were killed with a sharp instrument.
The metal box is covered with dust. You notice that it was once filled with coal, as you see some small pieces of it.

room.name: The Hell Yard
room.description: You are standing in a lot of mud. A disgusting smell surrounds the place, and makes you feel sick. Small flames sometimes shoot up from the hot mud. To the west there is a small door. To the north you can see an iron door.

direction.general_description: It is too dark to tell.
It is too dark to tell.

room.name: On The Walls Of The Abyss
room.description: You are clutching the steps on the wall so that you don't fall to the ground down below. You cannot see anymore handholds below you and thus this stops your journey down, as the only exit is up.

room.name: Cave Entrance
room.description: You are standing in the cave entrance. It is very dark down here. There is writing on the wall. There is an exit to the north. A stairway leads up.

direction.general_description: To the north you can see a small tunnel.
You can see the stairs going up into darkness.

extra_description.description: The writing says 'BEWARE adventurer!'

room.name: Cave Tunnel
room.description: You are walking in a tunnel. It is very cold. You can feel the presence of a living thing... SOMEWHERE.

direction.general_description: To the north you can see the tunnel continuing.
To the south tunnel continuing.

room.name: Cave Room
room.description: You are standing in a room. It is much cooler now. The walls are glowing.

direction.general_description: To the east you see the tunnel going downwards.
To the south you see a dark cave tunnel.

room.name: The Cave T-Cross
room.description: You are standing in a mudlike substance. The smell here is awful, it is rotten. To the west you can see some light.

direction.general_description: To the east the tunnel still goes downwards.
You can see some light to the west.

extra_description.description: When you examine the mud, you notice small worms crawling around.
The worms are purple. They do not look edible.

room.name: The Cave Turning-Point
room.description: The mud is getting deeper. You are wondering, 'Would it be an idea to leave, before I disappear?'. To the south you notice a flat round stone is blocking the way. To the west you can see mud.

direction.general_description: You can see an opening behind the stone.

extra_description.description: The stone looks very uninteresting. BUT as you are about to turn away, you see a strip of light coming through a small hole. Conclusion: The stone is moveable.

room.name: The Secret Room
room.description: There is dust all over the place. It looks like nobody has been here for ages. In the middle of the room you see a socket with a crystal globe. The globe glows with a pulsing light. To the north you see a stone door. To the south you see a grey block.

direction.general_description: You see a round stone door.
You see a grey block.

extra_description.description: The socket looks like the work of a dwarf. It is VERY beautiful.
The crystal globe is glowing with a pulsing light. It looks like there is smoke inside it.

room.name: The Mudhole
room.description: You are standing in a lot of mud. The mud goes to your chest. You feel the presence of something IN the mud. The only obvious exit is to the west.

direction.general_description: You can see nothing at all.

room.name: A Tunnel
room.description: The mud goes to your knees. Otherwise the tunnel looks very normal.

direction.general_description: You can see a mudhole.

room.name: The Long Tunnel
room.description: Here there is almost no mud, as you stand at the top of a small rock. Just beside you there are a sign which says 'WARNING! The worms are dangerous!'

direction.general_description: You can see a lot of mud... Yuck!
The tunnel goes a little downwards.

room.name: The Hot Room
room.description: You are very surprised, as this room for a change are hot instead of cold. To the north it goes downwards into some mud. There are also an exit to the west.

direction.general_description: You see a lot of mud.
You see a entrance to a small room.

room.name: The Small Room
room.description: As you look around you notice a small statue. There are exits to the west and to the east.

direction.general_description: It is pitch dark out there.
You see a VERY long hallway.

extra_description.description: This is a statue of a imp, pointing to the west. The imp looks like a man with horns and a tail.

room.name: The Stalagmite Cave
room.description: You are standing in a stalagmite cave. Water is dripping from the walls. It is very cold in here.

direction.general_description: You see a long hallway, and some mud.

extra_description.description: The stalagmites are very tall, and looks very beautiful.

room.name: The Stalagmite Tunnel
room.description: You has entered a small tunnel. Here it is quite dry. Maybe it would be a good idea to rest here.

direction.general_description: You can see a small cave to the north.

room.name: The Spongy Room
room.description: You definitely do NOT like this area. It is very dank, and most of the room is wet.

room.name: The Stalagmite T-Cross
room.description: You are standing in a cross. To the north you can see some light. Otherwise it is dark.

direction.general_description: You see some light ahead.

room.name: The Blind End Room
room.description: This room is obviously a blind end. To the north you see a primitive picture.

direction.general_description: You see a primitive picture of some people dancing around a huge sun. The sun is about 7 feet in diameter, which shows the size of the picture.

extra_description.description: You see some people dancing around a huge sun. The sun is about 7 feet in diameter, which shows the size of the picture.

room.name: The Treasure Room
room.description: This room is richly ornamented. The walls have been carved to show people dancing around a moon which is drawn on the floor. It looks very old, and it is very dusty. To the south you see the back side of a secret door.

direction.general_description: You can see a picture with some peeple crawling around a huge moon.

room.name: The Square Lair
room.description: You are standing in the south-east part of the lair. You can see a skeleton lying in the corner.

direction.general_description: Another part of the lair.
Another part of the lair.

extra_description.description: It looks like a adventurer who wasn't lucky. You'd better watch out...

room.name: The Square Lair
room.description: You are standing in the north-east part of the lair. You see a sign on the wall.

direction.general_description: You see a wooden door.
Another part of the lair.
Another part of the lair.

extra_description.description: The sign says 'Gods of War I call you, my sword is by my side, I seek a light free from all false pride' Reyemle Grug...

room.name: The Square Lair
room.description: You are standing in the north-west part of the lair. Here there is another sign. There is an exit from the lair to the north.

direction.general_description: You see a small tunnel leading north.
Another part of the lair.
Another part of the lair.

extra_description.description: The sign says 'I'm wandering around in a everlasting tale, seeking the light to regain my pride Corama...

room.name: The Lair End
room.description: You can see a table in front of you. It is very dusty. Five skeletons are sitting around the table. Exits are north and east.

direction.general_description: The northern part of the lair.
The eastern part of the lair.

extra_description.description: On the table there is dust, in the center there is a small statue of a Dragon sleeping.
They've obviously been killed somehow, but it doesn't look like it was by sword or club.
It looks like a silver dragon. It is nailed onto the table. The dragon sits on a red dragon that looks dead. But the eyes of the red dragon are glowing, pulsating red. You feel drained.

room.name: The East Tunnel
room.description: You are standing in dark tunnel, the exits are east and west. To the west you see a wooden door.

direction.general_description: You can see a muddy tunnel.
You can see a wooden door.

room.name: The North Tunnel
room.description: You are standing in a dark tunnel, it leads upwards.

direction.general_description: The dark tunnel continues.
You can see the lair.
You can see a cave entrance.

room.name: The L-Shaped Room
room.description: You are standing in deep darkness. To the south there is a small exit. To the east you can see a gaping hole.

room.name: The Circular Hall
room.description: You are standing in round hall. To the north, east and south you can see a stone head hanging on the walls.

direction.general_description: You see a red dragon's head hanging on the wall.
You see a green dragon's head hanging on the wall.
You see a blue dragon's head hanging on the wall.
You see a room far away.

extra_description.description: When you study the faces of the heads you see that they are faces of dragons. The face to the north is red, the face to the east is green, and the face to the south is blue.
This looks like an evil dragon.
This looks like a neutral dragon.
This looks like a good dragon.

room.name: A Dusty Tunnel
room.description: You are standing in dust. This place has not been touched for a long time. Otherwise it is quite boring here, looks like a place to rest! To the west you see the outline of a door. A tunnel leads to the east.

direction.general_description: You see a tunnel which leads downwards. It is quite dark.
You can see the outline of a door. Just like in the description!

room.name: The Crossing
room.description: You are standing in a crossing of hallways. You can leave this place in every direction, except up and down. In the dust you notice strange footprints.

extra_description.description: You have never seen this kind of footprint before!

room.name: The L-Shaped Room
room.description: You are standing in a L-shaped room. You can hear noises from the long tunnel to the east. You feel very afraid! A sign is hanging on the wall.

extra_description.description:
The sign says:
DANGER!!

room.name: The Dragon's Lair
room.description: You can see burned walls, the floorstones are fiery red. All kinds of bones are scattered all over the floor. On the walls you can see some burned shapes. You smell burnt flesh. Two creatures are half melted into the floor.

direction.general_description: You can see a long tunnel.
You can see nothing but darkness.

room.name: The Burnt Room
room.description: You are in a room, which once has at one time been quite burnt. There is writing on the wall.

direction.general_description: You can see a red glow...

extra_description.description:
The writing says:
DANGER

room.name: The Windy Tunnel
room.description: You are standing in a tunnel. Above you, you can feel a breeze.

direction.general_description: It is too dark to tell.

extra_description.description: The breeze comes from a hole above you. NO way to get up there.

room.name: The Glittering Room
room.description: This room is very bright. On the walls you can see some silver. Exits are west, east and south.

extra_description.description: The glittering silver looks like it is INSIDE the walls.

room.name: The Secret Passageway
room.description: You have entered a tiny room. There is only an exit to the west.

direction.general_description: You can see a light to the west.

room.name: The End Of Long Tunnel
room.description: You are at a end of a long tunnel. Right in front of you, you can see a grey mass. To the east you can see a tremendously long tunnel, but you know that, you were just there.

direction.general_description: A long tunnel. JUST like in the description!
A grey mass is blocking the way.

extra_description.description: The mass is nothing but a mass, but it is quite suspicious!

room.name: The Stair-Room
room.description: You are standing in a small room. Drawings of faces in pain are on the walls. You can feel that darkness is ruling the place. There is one exit: south.

direction.general_description: Nothing but darkness...

room.name: A Dark Tunnel
room.description: You are standing in a dark tunnel. It continues to the north and to the south. Bones are spread on the floor.

extra_description.description: It looks like bones of a human.

room.name: The Entrance To The Lair
room.description: The smell here is awful. To the south you can see some smoke. A tunnel leads north and east.

direction.general_description: A small cave is to the east.
The only thing you can see is smoke.

room.name: The North-Eastern Part Of The Basilisk's Cave
room.description: It is hard to see here because of the smoke. To the north you can barely see a small tunnel. Other exits are to the south and to the west.

room.name: The South-Eastern Part Of The Basilisk's Cave
room.description: There is a very small hole in wall from which the smoke is coming from. Otherwise it is pitch black. Exits are north and west.

direction.general_description: You can see nothing but smoke.
You can see nothing but smoke.

extra_description.description: It seems to be a small hole, about one foot in diameter.

room.name: The North-Western Part Of The Basilisk's Cave
room.description: You can see some hay spread on the floor. The smell is awful here, and it makes you feel sick. This place where the Basilisk sleeps. Watch out... maybe it is not far from here...

extra_description.description: The hay is very dirty. The smell of it makes you feel sick.

room.name: The South-Western Part Of The Basilisk's Cave
room.description: You can see nothing but smoke.

room.name: The Small Cave
room.description: You are standing in small cave. You can see some light at the end. Exits are north and south.

direction.general_description: You can see only smoke.
You can see a blue glow. And you feel a fresh breeze... ahhhh...

room.name: The Northern End Of The Pool
room.description: You have wet feet, you are standing in water. The water looks calm. You can see that it is a big lake. Light seeps from the water.

direction.general_description: You can see a small cave.
You can see more water.
You can see water.

room.name: The Pool
room.description: You are swimming in water. It is getting deep here. It is also dark in this end.

direction.general_description: You can see some bubbles in the water.
You see calm water.

room.name: The South End Of The Pool
room.description: You standing in water up to your neck! You can only see water.

direction.general_description: You can see calm water.
To dark to tell, but you can feel something nearby.

room.name: The Pool
room.description: You are swimming in DARKNESS. You feel something touching your right leg.

direction.general_description: To dark to tell.
You can feel a warm breeze.
